Board prog.assignment.gol.board.ArrayBoard.copyStateFrom ( List< String >  dataList  ) 

Copies the state to this board from the List given as argument

Parameters:
List dataList The source list of strings, which has the state to be copied from. This list is a list of strings, with each string representing the state of each row.
Returns:
The board, with the new state copied from the argument list, in each cell.

Board prog.assignment.gol.board.ArrayBoard.copyStateFrom ( Board  board  ) 

Copies the state to this board from the board given as argument board The source board which has the original state

Returns:
The board, with the new state copied from the argument board, in each cell.
